The University of Economics Ho Chi Minh city

educations.description: Teacher comment (Danny Colomer – Managing Director): “Great person and great student. Being one of the strongest of the group, Duc has shown all throughout the course a very good performance, both as a member of the group and on his English production. His listening and writing skills are above standards as it can be seen from his tests results. His speaking is also above standards. being the pronunciation the strongest area. He has a high level of commitment and self-confidence, specially when performing activities that require a business setting (meeting, interviews or presentations) Overall Duc has an impressive attitude towards the studying of Business skills. Without any doubts, he will succeed in his professional path. Best of luck to him”
